name: Wave (kostik1337, librorumque)
description:
Wave

Rana lives a peaceful life in the swamp, until one day a massive storm hits and big waves start to flow towards his home. Surfing is the only way to survive, surf away as long as you can!

This game was made during the last days of A Game By Its Cover jam '18, based on Wave cartridge by Sergio Barrio Slocker. Check out the original game (free) on iOS and Android

How to play

Use ← and → to steer. Jump for boosters to outrun the wave. Catch stars and spin 360's for better score. Land nose-fist or you'll trip.

Credits

Inspiration, Cover - Sergio Barrio Slocker

Code, Music - Kostik1337

Art - Librorumque
